message: Hi Bob, let's start with a simple split - 60/40. I believe this is a fair offer to kick things off. What do you think?
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, considering we're both starting this game. Let's get this division done and not waste any more time with inflation!
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I believe my initial proposal was already quite reasonable.  How about we meet in the middle - 55/45?
